content: Singaporean philatelist **Seow Chuan Koh** is a Singaporean [philatelist](/wiki/Philatelist) who was added to the [Roll of Distinguished Philatelists](/wiki/Roll_of_Distinguished_Philatelists) in 1992. Koh has formed gold medal-winning collections of classic India, Jaipur State, Perak, and Japanese handstamps on the [stamps of the Straits Settlements](/wiki/Postage_stamps_and_postal_history_of_the_Straits_Settlements). This article about a philatelist is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Seow Chuan Koh
